string.text: I'm here about that matter you mentioned...
Ah, Marked one... I have connections in the trade for updating military armor. Especially reinforcement, and installing PNV. Not too expensive, but my men haven't been paid for months...
I understand...
What updates can you offer for military suits?

I can install Pilot Night Vision onto any of these suits for you:
The Berill-5M suit
The SKAT9-M suit
The SKAT10-M suit
The Military bulletproof vest
The Medical Berill
And also to reinforce any of these suits
What would you like?
Night vision, please...
Is it to be installed on a standard suit, or one I've already reinforced?
On a standard suit...
Excellent... Which suit?
The Berill-5M suit...
The SKAT9-M suit...
The SKAT10-M suit...
The VDV suit...
The Military Exoskeleton...
The Military bulletproof vest...
The Medical Berill...

For the Berill-5M suit I can offer:
PNV 'Green' - 10,000Ru
PNV 'Sepia' - 15,000Ru
PNV 'Digital' - 25,000Ru
PNV 'Halogen' - 20,000Ru
PNV 'Cats Eye' - 30,000Ru
PNV 'Psi-effect' - 25,000Ru
PNV 'Moonlight' - 25,000Ru
PNV 'White Night' - 30,000Ru
Which would you like?
Standard 'Green'...
'Digital'...
'Sepia'...
'Halogen'...
'Cats Eye'...
'Psi-effect'...
'Moonlight'...
The best, please - 'White Night'...

I'd like to reinforce a suit...
What kind of suit do you want reinforcing - a standard suit, or one already fitted with night vision?
Standard...

Excellent... My quotations:
The Berill-5M suit - for a Skin artefact plus 10,000Ru
The SKAT9-M suit - for a Scale artefact plus 100,000Ru
The SKAT10-M suit - for a Steel Scale artefact plus 150,000Ru
The Military bulletproof vest - for a Skin artefact plus 5,000Ru
The Medical Berill - for a Skin artefact plus 30,000Ru
Onto which suit would you like it fitted?

Ah, sorry. Not at the moment, thanks...
Greetings, Syak...

Greetings, Marked One... Once again, thanks for the tools! While you were away I've been studying various Monolith suits to see how they made them... I passed on their specs to a few suppliers, and now I can offer upgrades on any Monolith suit...
Excellent, and well done. Very enterprising of you...
So can you update my suit?

I can install PNV onto any of these suits for you:
The Monolith suit
The Scientific Monolith suit
The Monolith Exoskeleton
The Monolith suit with gas mask
And I can also reinforce any of them
What would you like?
Night vision, please...
Do you want it installed on a standard suit, or a reinforced one?
On a standard suit...
Excellent... Onto which suit would you like it fitted?
The Monolith suit...

The Monolith Exoskeleton...

Raven's offers for mutant parts:
 
For two Controller hands, any one of the following - TOZ-34 / Saiga12k / BM-16 'Scattergun' / M4A1-Taktikal / Desert Eagle
 
For four Burer hands, any one of the following - Bizon / Kriss Super-V / MP-7a3
 
For five Pseudodog tails, any one of the following - Three packs of 12x70 'Buckshot' / Two packs of 12x70 'Slug' / One pack of 12x70 'Dart'
 
For ten Blind Dog tails, any one of the following - Four packs of 9x39mm 'PAB9' / Three packs of 9x39mm 'SP5' / Two packs of 9x39mm 'AP'

Raven's special offers:
 
I've heard that the Bandits found a hiding place full of weapons in the Dark Valley. The interesting thing is that they're all from the late 19th and early 20th centuries. Can you believe that? They must have been buried there long before both World Wars... A couple of Duty members came to see Artyom for a snack, and told him all about it a few days ago!
Well, I have a special client, a collector of sorts from outside the Perimeter, and visits the Zone from time to time...
They're probably all over the Zone by now, so if you find any interesting or unique weapons during your travels, come and see me and we'll do business, okay? No questions asked, and I'd certainly make it worth your while...

Either a 'Guardian of Freedom' suit, or 'Duty' PSZ-9MD armor, for ten bottles of vodka
 
Either 3 x packs of 9x39mm 'PAB9', or 2 x packs of 9x39mm 'AP', for ten bottles of vodka

Text Messages
Marked One, my boys have informed me that this lump of pigshit Krysjuk is dead, and his PDA was not found on him! Come and see me as soon as you can. We need to talk...
Marked One, it's Bullet. Bes is dead. As I understand, he did not receive the box of ammo you had for him. Take it to Voronin instead, but don't try to bargain with him...
This is Lukash, the Freedom leader. My men are in trouble, and need a box of ammo urgently. Come and see me quickly. You'll be rewarded...

Marked One! We are seriously short of ammo. Bullet told me you're on your way to Bes with more, but we've just heard that Bes got killed. If you still have the ammo, please bring it to us instead, in the hangar! You'll be rewarded...
Marked One, it's Wolf! I've not heard anything from Fanatic for a long time. He's one of my best men... Come and see me urgently!
Marked One, it's Screw. Bad news - Max has been killed. I heard you had some business with him concerning a teleport... If you're still interested, then I am too...
Marked One, it's Dan! I've just heard that Jurek's been killed... Come and see me. We need to talk...
Never forget...
Vein wants the Hunter's rifle. Bargain with him in the Bar for it...
Bring the Hunter two crates of canned beer...
Talk to Vein, informing him of the Hunter's terms. That he'll only surrender his rifle to Vein after he receives his beer...
Bring Vein the Hunter's rifle. You'll find him in the Bar, drunk as always...
Bring Fox an Exoskeleton with 'White Night' night vision...
Bes needs Strelok's reinforced suit, with 'Moonlight' night vision...
The Bandit known as 'The Rat' has collected many of Borov's secrets on his PDA. Now that this Rat has been found dead Borov wants this PDA, and believes that Vein knows something about it

Wolf is trying to monitor the local military, for which he really needs a proper army radio transceiver. Fanatic was supposed to find him one, but has not been in touch. I need to find Fanatic, and ensure that it gets to Wolf...
Screw promises to calibrate a teleport for moving from the Army Warehouses to Yantar, in exchange for some 'Playboy' magazines from Sakharov
Seriy, having learned of Bes' death, needs me to bring him the box of ammo intended for Bes as compensation...
Bullet, having learned of Bes' death, needs me to convey a box of cartridges to general Voronin
The Freedom fighters have picked up Bullet's message. Lukash needs me to take a box of ammo to Bes
Dan, the dealer in the Swamps, needs some beer. For ten cans he promises a Recipe for transforming an artefact...
Dan, the dealer in the Swamps, needs a bag taken to Raven, and a Benelli M3 sawn-off shotgun brought back. For this, he promises a unique artefact...
